comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13731?focusedCommentId=17430525) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Closing this ticket as the chapter on working with Arrow Table objects via the dplyr API implicitly covers this via `dplyr::mutate`.  However, other things we should consider separately:
- do we want to provide instructions for working with the lower-level Arrow objects available in R and calling their methods directly? I think this depends on our target audience
- do we want to include a chapter on working with Dataset objects and discuss the differences between Tables and Datasets? I think so
